data.message: Why has my Facebook app on my Tablet stopped working? 3rd day now and I keep getting a message without anything loading saying Facebook has stopped working!! I send in a report each time and no help!! What the heck is going on??

replies.message: Hey Natalie. We’re sorry to hear that you’re experiencing issues with your tablet Facebook application. Please help us track this issue by reporting it in our Help Center. http://on.fb.me/18dEFaD -Sarah
It's the Facebook for android and those options in the link don't help bc i can't take a screen shot!! Have u been hearing about this issue the past few days??
In case you haven't tried, did you restart it?  I had that problem with my android tablet before, several times actually, and it might have gotten an update and just needed to be restarted.....
